# Complete Azure DevOps Security Role Assignment Fixture

This fixture demonstrates a fully specified security role assignment for tests.

## Features

- Uses explicit scope, resource, and role inputs
- Supports overriding the role name

## Key Configuration

Use this fixture to validate non-default role assignments.

## Usage

```bash
terraform init
terraform plan
terraform apply
```

## Cleanup

```bash
terraform destroy
```
